title: I am not a guy who listens to music at high volumes. I usually hear music at 30%-40%. How long can I listen to songs with my over-ear headphones? - Quora

response.answer_text: As long as you like. You’ll be bothered physically more than systemically. Your ears may get sore and I’m not talking about the eardrum or the canals. I’m talking about the external ear from the pressure of any device, so sometimes we have to takeoff headphones and rub our ears for a moment and then put them back on!
